segments.text: Water gushing from the sink, soaking everything in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's spreading, dirty and slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman stands in it, clueless and damp.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's probably getting ruined too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Climbing on a stool to steal cookiesâ€”filthy hands in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's begging for one, like it's not gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Crumbly cookies mixed with potential falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are dripping, what a nasty mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the peaceful garden can't clean this up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wouldn't touch anything in there now.
segments.speaker: PAR
